price: Hakuwa yeye (Isa) ila ni Mtumwa tuliye mneemesha na tukamfanya ni mfano kwa Wana wa Israili.
arabic: إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا عَبۡدٌ أَنۡعَمۡنَا عَلَيۡهِ وَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ مَثَلٗا لِّبَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ
footnotes: Isa si chochote ila ni mja tuliye mneemesha kwa kumpa Unabii, na tumemfanya awe ni zingatio la ajabu kama ni mithali, kwa kumuumba bila ya baba, kwa Wana wa Israili, wapate ushahidi wa ukamilifu wa uweza wetu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: in huwa illā ʿabdun anʿamnā ʿalayhi wajaʿalnāhu mathalan libanī is'rāīla
